title: Boardroom Quality of Life Updates (Enter Key + Auto-scroll)

requirements.text: Update the <Textarea> in the Boardroom Text Command Console (frontend/src/App.tsx) to add an onKeyDown event handler that prevents the default new line behavior when the Enter key is pressed without holding Shift, and instead triggers handleSendCommand() to submit the command.

quotes: Update the <Textarea> in the Text Command Console. Add an onKeyDown event so that pressing the "Enter" key (without holding Shift) prevents the default new line and triggers handleSendCommand().

acceptanceCriteria: Pressing Enter without Shift submits the command and clears the textarea
Pressing Shift+Enter inserts a new line in the textarea
The onKeyDown handler calls event.preventDefault() to block default Enter behavior before triggering handleSendCommand()

requirements.text: Implement auto-scroll in the DebateDisplay component (or the transcript container in frontend/src/App.tsx). Create a useRef pointing to an element at the bottom of the transcript container, and add a useEffect hook that smoothly scrolls that ref into view whenever debateState.transcript updates.

quotes: In the DebateDisplay (or the container holding the transcript), implement a standard React auto-scroll. Use a useRef at the bottom of the transcript container and a useEffect that scrolls that ref into view smoothly whenever debateState.transcript updates.

acceptanceCriteria: A ref element is placed at the bottom of the transcript container
A useEffect hook monitors debateState.transcript changes
When transcript updates, the ref scrolls into view with smooth behavior
The auto-scroll does not interfere with manual scrolling by the user

constraints: Do NOT modify, read, or rebuild backend/main.mo (Version 56 Golden Master)
Only modify frontend files, specifically frontend/src/App.tsx or related Boardroom UI components
Preserve all existing Boardroom functionality including Push-to-Talk and Send button
nonGoals: Changes to debate logic or agent behavior
Changes to authentication or identity management
